Aequitas Rules Roundup 2022-05-xx

Stratagem
  • Does a stratagem changing the attack/defence of a character change the base values for the character?
    No. For example, if Private Pteraxadonâ€™s Binary Edgewing Scythe upgrade mode removes the base defense from a defending Windblade, Combiner Hunter, it would not remove the +1 from the Camien Toughness stratagem.
Stratagem
  • I am playing Nightbird, Enigmatic Agent in alt mode. My opponent plays Brainstorm and 2 follow-up actions. I reveal a Secret Action to stop 1 of the follow-ups. Does my opponent still take 3 damage?
    Yes. Even when cancelled by an action such as Infiltrate, Jam Signals, or Overrule, a card is still played and an effects that refer to cards, or number of cards, being played still occur. Another example would be Thundercracker, Mach Warrior's bot mode effect.
Safeguard
  • How does Steamroll and Grimlock, Dinobot Leader's bot mode ability work with Safeguard?
    As with Skrapnel's bot mode ability, attempting to Steamroll into an undamaged character with three health and Safeguard (for example Slammer, Combat Drone with a Medic's Protective Field) will first see the damage reduced to 3 damage, and then KO the character. No additional attack damage would be available to be steamrolled into another character.
Deck
  • Does the order of the scrap matter?
    No.
Heroic Resolve
  • If I Steamroll into an Autobot and KO them, but my opponent reveals a Heroic Resolve; do I do any additional damage?
    No - the Autobot was not in fact KO'd.
